recommendations.current_issue: Low CTR and ROAS due to generic messaging and lack of differentiation.

creative_variations.headline: Real Men, Real Comfort
creative_variations.message: Discover why men love our breathable athletic briefs. Endorsed by real customers for ultimate comfort and style.
creative_variations.rationale: UGC has shown high ROAS. Leveraging real customer testimonials can enhance trust and engagement.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Doctors recommend breathable cotton — meet our men athletic briefs.

creative_variations.headline: Stay Cool, Stay Confident
creative_variations.message: Explore our range of cooling mesh briefs. Perfect for workouts and everyday wear.
creative_variations.rationale: Carousel format allows showcasing multiple product benefits and styles, increasing engagement.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Breathable bamboo that moves with you — limited offer on men inner vests.

recommendations.audience_considerations: Target active men aged 18-35 interested in fitness and comfort.

recommendations.current_issue: Messaging lacks urgency and personalization, leading to lower engagement.

creative_variations.headline: Feel the Freedom
creative_variations.message: Experience seamless comfort with our wire-free bras. Limited time offer!
creative_variations.rationale: Creating urgency with a limited-time offer can increase CTR and ROAS.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Breathable cotton that moves with you — limited offer on men athletic briefs.

creative_variations.headline: Invisible Comfort, Visible Confidence
creative_variations.message: Watch how our seamless panties transform your everyday comfort. Perfect for any outfit.
creative_variations.rationale: Video format can effectively demonstrate product benefits and increase engagement.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Doctors recommend breathable organic cotton — meet our men athletic briefs.

recommendations.audience_considerations: Focus on women aged 25-45 seeking comfort and style in everyday wear.

testing_strategy: Implement A/B testing with a control group using current creatives and test groups using new variations to measure CTR and ROAS improvements.
